file.content:
FROM mtkomcr.mediatek.inc/public/python:3.11-slim

# Create a non-root user and set permissions
ARG UID=1000
ARG GID=3000
ARG USER=appuser
ARG USER_GROUP=appusergroup
ARG HOME=/home/$USER

WORKDIR $HOME

RUN groupadd -g $GID $USER_GROUP \
   && useradd -u $UID -g $GID --create-home $USER \
   && chown -R $USER:$USER_GROUP $HOME

# 安裝系統依賴
RUN sed -i s@http://deb.debian.org@http://oa-mirror.mediatek.inc@g /etc/apt/sources.list.d/debian.sources
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y gcc g++

USER $USER:$USER_GROUP

# Set the PATH environment variable to include the directory where uv installs scripts
ENV PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:${PATH}"

# Install uv (using internal PyPI mirror)
COPY ./requirements.txt /code/requirements.txt
RUN pip install --index-url=http://oa-mirror.mediatek.inc/repository/pypi/simple --trusted-host=oa-mirror.mediatek.inc --no-cache-dir --user uv

# Copy the project files
COPY --chown=$USER:$USER_GROUP . $HOME/app

WORKDIR $HOME/app

# Install Python dependencies with uv (using internal PyPI mirror)
RUN pip install --trusted-host pypi.org --trusted-host pypi.python.org --trusted-host files.pythonhosted.org --index-url=http://oa-mirror.mediatek.inc/repository/pypi/simple --trusted-host=oa-mirror.mediatek.inc --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

# Expose the port (adjust if your server uses a different port)
EXPOSE 8000

ENV FASTMCP_HOST=0.0.0.0

# Run the MCP server
CMD ["python", "main.py"]

diff --git a/Dockerfile b/Dockerfile
index 10c4ec8..7380602 100644
--- a/Dockerfile
+++ b/Dockerfile
@@ -34,6 +34,15 @@ WORKDIR $HOME/app
 # Install Python dependencies with uv (using internal PyPI mirror)
 RUN pip install --trusted-host pypi.org --trusted-host pypi.python.org --trusted-host files.pythonhosted.org --index-url=http://oa-mirror.mediatek.inc/repository/pypi/simple --trusted-host=oa-mirror.mediatek.inc --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
 
+# Create directory for cacert.pem if it doesn't exist
+RUN mkdir -p $HOME/.local/lib/python3.11/site-packages/certifi
+
+# Copy cacert.pem from certs directory to the specified location
+COPY --chown=$USER:$USER_GROUP certs/cacert.pem $HOME/.local/lib/python3.11/site-packages/certifi/cacert.pem
+
+# Verify the cacert.pem file is available
+RUN ls -la $HOME/.local/lib/python3.11/site-packages/certifi/cacert.pem
+
 # Expose the port (adjust if your server uses a different port)
 EXPOSE 8000

diff --git a/Dockerfile b/Dockerfile
index 10c4ec8..7380602 100644
--- a/Dockerfile
+++ b/Dockerfile
@@ -34,6 +34,15 @@ WORKDIR $HOME/app
 # Install Python dependencies with uv (using internal PyPI mirror)
 RUN pip install --trusted-host pypi.org --trusted-host pypi.python.org --trusted-host files.pythonhosted.org --index-url=http://oa-mirror.mediatek.inc/repository/pypi/simple --trusted-host=oa-mirror.mediatek.inc --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
 
+# Create directory for cacert.pem if it doesn't exist
+RUN mkdir -p $HOME/.local/lib/python3.11/site-packages/certifi
+
+# Copy cacert.pem from certs directory to the specified location
+COPY --chown=$USER:$USER_GROUP certs/cacert.pem $HOME/.local/lib/python3.11/site-packages/certifi/cacert.pem
+
+# Verify the cacert.pem file is available
+RUN ls -la $HOME/.local/lib/python3.11/site-packages/certifi/cacert.pem
+
 # Expose the port (adjust if your server uses a different port)
 EXPOSE 8000
